word_mean_info__list.difference: 多指空间关系或方向上向外的。
主要提离开中心或内部较远的，或指比较在外的。
强调位于事物的外表以上，但仍是该事物的一部分，较正式。
指与其他物体分离或没有关系的外部，不涉及内容，只说明全然是外部的。
指超出某种界限之外的。

word_group.brief_definition: 创造性地思考；富有革新精神地思考；不受条条框框束缚地思考
超出（理解、能力、讨论等的）范围；不属于；超出
现场实录节目；现场拍摄节目；现场直播节目
外部世界；外面世界；外界

bilingual.source: I can see it from the outside.

bilingual.target: 那是外面有什么东西在动吗？

bilingual.source: It is even hotter inside the train than outside.
We put up a tent and cooked outside.
bilingual.target: 我们搭了帐篷并在外面做饭。

list.abstract: Outside（英 [ˌaʊtˈsaɪd , ˈaʊtsaɪd]，美 [ˌaʊtˈsaɪd , ˈaʊtsaɪd]），英语单词，作名词为外面；表面；外表。作形容词为外面的；外部的；外界的。作介词为在……的外面；向……外面；超出……范围。例句：Go outside to enjoy fresh air.（到户外享受新鲜空气。） Outside的近义词有outer、external、out等，反义词有inside、indoor、indoors。
《Outside》是苏格兰DJCalvin Harris创作，由歌手Ellie Goulding演唱的一首歌曲。收录在Calvin Harris的第四张专辑“Motion”（2014）的歌曲。也收录在Goulding的第三张专辑“Delirium”的豪华版中。 这是Calvin Harris与Ellie Goulding的第二次合作。第一次合作是《I Need Your Love》。

yingyinNormal.en: I'll be outside when you finish.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我去外面等你了。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't see the outside-side.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看不见外面的那一边。

yingyinNormal.en: Phoebe. Okay, let's talk outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 菲比! 好吧，我们在外面谈。

yingyinNormal.en: They're right outside. And if I run?
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们就在外面。如果我跑呢？

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, mom, I just heard you outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈，你刚在外面说的我都听见了。

yingyinNormal.en: My favorite? Well, I like it when we're outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我最喜欢的？我喜欢我们在外面的时候。

yingyinNormal.en: The outside world awaits. Remember, Wicked is good.
yingyinNormal.zh: 外面的世界在等待，要记住，我们都是好样的。

yingyinNormal.en: Smiling on the outside. Will you hug my backpack? No.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在外面要微笑。你可以抱抱我的背包吗？不。

yingyinNormal.en: Alright, let's take this outside. Let's take this outside? Who talks like that?
yingyinNormal.zh: 很好，我们到外面解决“我们到外面解决”？谁会这么说？

yingyinNormal.en: We'll be right outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在外面等你。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, George, let's play outside. George does not want to play outside. He is waiting to see Cuckoo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 来吧，乔治，我们去外面玩。乔治不想到外面去玩。他要等着看布谷鸟。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, but after this, I want to see you outside. If it stops raining.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好的，但是之后，我要在外面跟你单挑，如果外面停止下雨的话。

yingyinNormal.en: I see the rain has stopped outside. So? So maybe you could all play outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我看到外面的雨已经不下了。所以呢？所以，或许你们就可以出去玩了。

yingyinNormal.en: Cam, it is so beautiful outside. You got to... Oh right.
yingyinNormal.zh: 小卡，外面天气真好，你得……好吧。

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, you guys oh hurry up, get some, there's a whole cart outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家动作快点，外面还有一车。

yingyinNormal.en: You should go outside and be with the three-dimensional people. No. Inside good. Outside bad.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们应该走出这里，去跟三维空间的人打交道。不，里面好，外面坏。

yingyinNormal.en: To put it plainly, his mouth was on the outside of his face.
yingyinNormal.zh: 说白了就是他的嘴跑到他的脸外面了。

yingyinNormal.en: It is raining today. So, Peppa and George cannot play outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天下雨了，所以佩琪和乔治不能在外面玩。

yingyinNormal.en: Peppa and George are very excited today. It is snowing outside!
yingyinNormal.zh: 佩琪和乔治今天非常地兴奋。因为外面下雪了！

yingyinNormal.en: Well, there's our relaxed dining area, and there are stalls outside.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们有一处餐饮休息区，外面还有小吃摊。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 超出(理解、能力、讨论等的)范围；不属于；超出
创造性地思考；富有革新精神地思考；不受条条框框束缚地思考

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外人；圈外人；不大可能成功的竞争者；不被社会所接受的人；不愿融入社会的人

word_family.mean: n. 外面；表面；外表；外观；外侧；外跑道；一令纸的上下两张

examination_example.sentence: Until now, many sellers have been able to avoid charging sales taxes when they ship to addresses <highlight>outside</highlight> those states.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到目前为止，许多卖家在向这些州以外的地址发货时，已能够避免收取销售税。

examination_example.sentence: You'd think this might fuel the efficiency mind-set, but in fact, such ritualistic behaviour helps us "step <highlight>outside</highlight> time's flow" into "soul time."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你会认为这可能会助长效率思维定势，但事实上，这种仪式化的行为有助于我们“走出时间在流逝”的心理，而进入“心灵时间”。

examination_example.sentence: As of 2005, there were almost half a million professional social scientists working both inside and <highlight>outside</highlight> academia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 截至2005年，有近50万专业社会科学家在学术界内外工作。

examination_example.sentence: Young people were more likely than older adults to maintain that children are best served by two parents working <highlight>outside</highlight> the home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 与老年人相比，年轻人更倾向于主张孩子最好由在外工作的父母照顾。

examination_example.sentence: And for women who work <highlight>outside</highlight> the home, they often are playing catch-up-with-household tasks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 而对于在外工作的女性来说，她们经常忙于做家务。

examination_example.sentence: This is why people who work <highlight>outside</highlight> the home have better health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这就是为什么在外工作的人身体更好。

examination_example.sentence: Furthermore, the highest CEO salaries are paid to <highlight>outside</highlight> candidates, not to the cozy insider picks.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 此外，最高的CEO（首席执行官）薪酬是支付给外部候选人的，而不是给安逸的内部人员。

examination_example.sentence: Manuscript will be flagged up for additional scrutiny by the journal's internal editors, or by <highlight>outside</highlight> peer reviewers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 稿件将被标记出来，接受期刊内部编辑或外部同行评审人员的进一步审查。

examination_example.sentence: If we know female job screeners are more likely to reject attractive female applicants, we can hire <highlight>outside</highlight> screeners.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们知道女性工作筛选者更有可能拒绝有吸引力的女性申请人，我们可以雇佣外部筛选者。

examination_example.sentence: One of the main purposes was to allow people to get insurance <highlight>outside</highlight> of employment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其主要目的之一是允许人们在就业之外获得保险。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外人；圈外人；不大可能成功的竞争者；不被社会所接受的人；不愿融入社会的人

word_family.mean: n. 外面；表面；外表；外观；外侧；外跑道；一令纸的上下两张

sense_info_list.zh: 户外; 在外面的; 户外的

examination_example.sentence: They found that up to 421,000 units of bacteria can collect on the <highlight>outside</highlight> of a single shoe.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，仅仅一只鞋的鞋面上就可以聚集多达42.1万个细菌单位。

examination_example.sentence: If you are a manufacturer who relies on <highlight>outside</highlight> distributors, then retailers are the ideal partner for collecting old products.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你是一个依靠外部经销商的制造商，那么零售商将是回收旧物的理想伙伴。

examination_example.sentence: Reducing waste can decrease the price of procurement: less to be procured from the <highlight>outside</highlight> and more to be re-utilized from the inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 将回收材料投入生产可以降低采购价格:减少外部采购，增加内部再利用。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外人；圈外人；不大可能成功的竞争者；不被社会所接受的人；不愿融入社会的人

word_family.mean: n. 外面；表面；外表；外观；外侧；外跑道；一令纸的上下两张

sense_info_list.zh: 户外; 在外面的; 户外的

examination_example.sentence: After combing through the security video <highlight>outside</highlight> a Gorbals shop, Kirsteen has posted an image of a man suspected of stealing the dog.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在梳理了Gorbals商店外的安全视频后，Kirsteen发布了一张涉嫌偷狗的男子的照片。

examination_example.sentence: He ran <highlight>outside</highlight> but the customer was gone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他跑出去，但顾客已经走了。

examination_example.sentence: Get <highlight>outside</highlight>, stretch your legs, do something cultural, buy yourself something tasty to eat or something pretty to wear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 出去走走，伸伸腿，做些有文化的事情，给自己买些好吃的或者好看的衣服。

examination_example.sentence: It may make people feel that they ought to fit in with the <highlight>outside</highlight> world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能会让人们觉得他们应该适应外面的世界。

examination_example.sentence: Recent studies have shown that children and young people largely prefer to see a counsellor in school rather than in an <highlight>outside</highlight> environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近的研究表明，儿童和年轻人很大程度上更喜欢在学校而不是在外面的环境中见到辅导员。

examination_example.sentence: If you eat three meals a day, you probably get at least a third of your daily calories (卡路里) <highlight>outside</highlight> the home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你一天吃三顿饭，你可能会摄入至少超过你日常在家三分之一的热量。

examination_example.sentence: Some teachers are finding ways to expose students to Asian-Amenican issues—if not during school hours, then <highlight>outside</highlight> of them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些老师正在想办法让学生接触亚裔美国人的问题——如果不是在上课时间，就在课外。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外人；圈外人；不大可能成功的竞争者；不被社会所接受的人；不愿融入社会的人

word_family.mean: n. 外面；表面；外表；外观；外侧；外跑道；一令纸的上下两张

examination_example.sentence: By the time the group got up to leave, it was pouring <highlight>outside</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当这群人起身准备离开时，外面正下着倾盆大雨。

examination_example.sentence: Go <highlight>outside</highlight> and work out a plan to translate your childhood memories into your grown-up garden.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走出去，制定一个计划，把你童年的记忆转化成你长大后的花园。

examination_example.sentence: A woman saw him crying and told him to wait <highlight>outside</highlight> the shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个女人看见他哭了，让他在商店外面等着。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 外人；圈外人；不大可能成功的竞争者；不被社会所接受的人；不愿融入社会的人

word_family.mean: n. 外面；表面；外表；外观；外侧；外跑道；一令纸的上下两张

examination_example.sentence: Because he couldn't find a seat <highlight>outside</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 因为他在外面找不到座位。

examination_example.sentence: Go <highlight>outside</highlight> to enjoy fresh air.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到户外享受新鲜空气。

examination_example.sentence: Is it hot <highlight>outside</highlight>?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 外面热吗？

examination_example.sentence: Most of its books are from <highlight>outside</highlight> of Darayya.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的大部分书都来自达拉亚之外。

examination_example.sentence: As many as 1 in 4 people who use computers use one for three hours or more <highlight>outside</highlight> of work and school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 多达四分之一使用计算机的人在工作和学校之外使用计算机三个小时或更长时间。

examination_example.sentence: How to find a hotel <highlight>outside</highlight> a city.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如何在城外找到酒店。

examination_example.sentence: A mirror is hung opposite a window to take in the <highlight>outside</highlight> scenery.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 窗户对面挂着一面镜子，以捕捉外面的风景。

examination_example.sentence: China has made great achievements since it opened its doors to the <highlight>outside</highlight> world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国对外开放以来，取得了巨大成就。

examination_example.sentence: For me, this moment means a better self inside and a larger world <highlight>outside</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对我来说，这一刻意味着內在有一个更好的自我，一个更大的外在世界。

examination_example.sentence: It's inside and <highlight>outside</highlight> are decorated with giant panda pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的内部和外部都装饰着大熊猫图片。

examination_example.sentence: Electric and gasoline vehicles look similar on the <highlight>outside</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电动和汽油车的外观看起来很相似。

examination_example.sentence: A wolf in sheep’s clothing describes someone who acts and looks nice on the <highlight>outside</highlight> but is bad on the inside.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 披着羊皮的狼描述了一个演技和外表都很好，但内表不好的人。
